items.title: How Did The Toy Kill Aunt Ida In The Monkey? This Plot Hole Has Been Bothering Me Since I Watched It
items.description: The Monkey changes a lot from Stephen King's original short story, but I'm certain Oz Perkins' horror movie leaves one unexplained plot hole open.

items.title: Revelations Trailer
items.description: Trailer for the Netflix movie Revelations.

items.title: I Don’t Like How Alien Treated The Franchise’s Most Important Character Since Sigourney Weaver’s Ripley
items.description: Prometheus introduces the best character in the Alien franchise since Ripley, but she is tragically killed off-screen before Alien: Covenant.
